name: Steel Love Z: Hard Bangers
description:
Steel Love Z: Hard Bangers picks up right after Steel Love XI, and continues the story of this beloved series in a fresh new take.

The city of New Cytheria comes alive in this sprawling 2D adventure, where classic characters sing together in a joyful musical adventure.

Made as part of the Steel Love game jam, hosted by Kyle Bosman in spring 2022.
